annonsrubrik: Project Lead to BMW Financial Services
annonstext:
Jurek Rekrytering & Bemanning erbjuder ett komplett utbud av bemannings- och rekryteringstjänster. Vi rekryterar och hyr ut alltifrån studenter till yrkesverksamma akademiker med mångårig erfarenhet och specialistkompetens. Våra uppdrag är främst inom juridik, ekonomi, HR, marknad och administration.			    

Do you like working in an international environment? Do you like being involved in and handling a variety of topics? Would you like to deepen and share your knowledge about customer experiences and continues process improvement in our region as well as connect with different internal and external stakeholders in different countries?

As Project Lead you will work at a fun and unpretentious workplace with a strong brand with great opportunities to grow your career within the Nordic Operations. The role is supporting both the BMW/MINI retail and Alphabet business on a Nordic level. We place great demands but also offer much in return.
In this function your main responsibilities and tasks will be:
 • Together with your colleagues you will take on an important role to reach our vision to bring joy to the world of mobility and provide the best customer experience
 • As project lead you will make sure that we deliver our projects on time and with excellent quality
 • The project lead have end to end responsibility for its own project portfolio reaching from the initial planning process, to ensuring business specifications, test management, and make sure to comply with global BMW Group standards for project management
 • Liaise with HQ functions when needed and manage all levels of project stakeholders, including senior management
 • Your act in a team that is the Center of Competence for executing change activities ranging from small change requests to large projects and programs within our strategical focus areas

Pre-Requisites for the role:
You hold a bachelor´s in economics or equivalent. Gained relevant (3+ years) experience in working within financial service and/or an IT/process related organization. Advantage if you have the experience of working in a regional set-up.

We believe that you have the ability to transform your passion for optimizing and drive continuous process improvement into delivering premium services for our customers as well for internal stakeholders. As holder of this role you need to embrace diversity and cultural differences. We expect that you proactively take advantage of being part of an international community within the BMW Group Munich. We will place great emphasis on your personal characteristics.

You need to be fluent in written and verbal in both English and one of the Nordic languages (Swedish, Danish, Norwegian). The function is located in modern facilities in Stockholm, Sollentuna, and you will be reporting to the Head of Operation Governance Northern Europe.
How to apply
In this recruitment process BMW is supported by Jurek. We accept applications in both Swedish and English. Interviews will be carried out as applications are received so please apply as soon as possible via www.jurek.se, but no later than 30.04.2021. For more information please contact FIRSTNAME LASTNAME Billing,  EMAIL   TELEPHONENO or FIRSTNAME LASTNAME,  EMAIL   TELEPHONENO . 
About BMW Financial Services
BMW Financial Services Northern Europe coordinates and provides Financial support to the Nordic national sales companies, as well as to authorized BMW- and MINI dealers in the Nordics and Baltics. In the Nordics, BMW Financial Services has approximately 160 employees.

The customer chooses BMW primarily because it is fun to drive and not because it is fun with financing and paperwork. That´s why BMW Financial Services has made it easy and convenient to finance their car with them. For more information about BMW, visit the website www.bmwgroup.com
